dishes.shortDescription: Cream, mozzarella, yellow tomatoes, cherry tomatoes, arugula, basil, balsamic cream. Allergens: cereals, lactose.

dishes.name: MARGHERITA POMODORO GIALLO
dishes.shortDescription: Grated tomatoes, mozzarella, yellow tomatoes, basil. Allergens: cereals, lactose.

dishes.name: PEPPERONI MELANZANE
dishes.shortDescription: Ground tomatoes, mozzarella, marinated spicy eggplant by homemade Italian recipe, spicy salami pepperoni, mozzarella and Parmesan cheese. Allergens: cereals, lactose.

dishes.name: SOFT VEGETABLE CREAM-SOUP WITH BACON
dishes.shortDescription: Potato, carrot, onion, celery stalk, milk, olive oil. Decorated with bacon chips, ruccola and truffle oil

dishes.name: HOT TOMATO SOUP
dishes.shortDescription: Shredded tomato soup with grated Mozzarella cheese. Allergens: lactose, celery.

dishes.name: CHICKEN SOUP WITH PASTA
dishes.shortDescription: Soup with chicken, pasta, carrot, celery and parsley. Allergens: cereals, celery.

dishes.name: SALMON WITH VEGETABLES GRILL
dishes.shortDescription: Soft roasted salmon fillet. Served with vegetables grill with adding unagi sauce

dishes.name: CHICKEN WITH AUBERGINES
dishes.shortDescription: Juicy chicken brisket, marinated in herbs with spices and grilled, served on fried aubergines with fresh tomatoes, greens and sesame-citrus sauce. Allergens: cereals, sesame seeds, soybeans.

dishes.name: PHISTACHIO TIRAMISU
dishes.shortDescription: Traditional italian dessert with phistachio paste

dishes.name: A WAFFER CAKE
dishes.shortDescription: A wafer cake with condensed milk and hazelnuts. Allergens: lactose, cereals, nuts.
